original_text: Also, think about ships that sail on the sea. They are very large. Strong winds push them with great power. But we fix a piece of wood at the back of the ship. With this small piece of wood, the master can cause the ship to go anywhere that he wants it to go.
korean_text: 또 배를 보라 그렇게 크고 광풍에 밀려가는 것들을 지극히 작은 키로써 사공의 뜻대로 운행하나니

sentences.original_text: Also, think about ships that sail on the sea.
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 바다에서 항해하는 배들을 생각해 보세요.

sentences.original_text: Strong winds push them with great power.
sentences.korean_translation: 강한 바람이 그것들을 큰 힘으로 밀어냅니다.

sentences.original_text: But we fix a piece of wood at the back of the ship.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 우리는 배 뒤쪽에 나무 조각을 고정시킵니다.

sentences.original_text: With this small piece of wood, the master can cause the ship to go anywhere.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 작은 나무 조각으로, 선장은 배를 어디든 가게 할 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: that he wants it to go.
